title: Process Automation
description: Runs a local application w/ configurable command-line arguments that can be static or by content properties.

parameters.label: Process Path
parameters.description: The process can be a standard application or batch script

parameters.label: Prefer running process?
parameters.description: When checked, arguments will be pasted (separated by new lines) to most recently activated processes or a new process is started (which is default). *This is intended to be used with paste arguments.

parameters.label: Arguments
parameters.description: Execute arguments for the process. Content Paths will be pre-processed into selected (or action input) values. If there are any conflicts to property path then pad the conflicting path with '@' symbols ie. '{@ItemData@}'

parameters.label: Run as Administrator
parameters.description: This will only be evaluated if this application is run as administrator

parameters.label: Silent
parameters.description: Process will not appear in taskbar

parameters.label: Close on Complete
parameters.description: Once process is complete, output is returned and its window will be closed

parameters.label: Shell Execute
parameters.description: Mark this as true if process must use operating system shell. However if process needs a different working directory than it's executable leave this unchecked.'

parameters.label: Working Directory
parameters.description: When left empty the process will execute in its directory on the file system

parameters.label: Window Type
parameters.description: When 'Silent' is checked, window type is ignored
